With file-based storage and no database required, it offers one-click Docker deployment and NAS compatibility for personal or intranet use.

summary.en: Afilmory is a modern, high-performance photo gallery platform for photographers, featuring S3/GitHub sync, EXIF metadata display, interactive maps, and a WebGL-based viewer. Built with React + TypeScript, it offers responsive masonry layouts, HDR support, Fujifilm recipe rendering, and both SaaS and self-hosting options.

summary.en: Input Leap is an open-source KVM software that enables keyboard and mouse sharing across multiple computers via software, mimicking hardware KVM switches. It supports Windows, macOS, Linux, and FreeBSD, allowing control switching by moving the mouse to screen edges or using hotkeys. Clipboard sharing is supported (except on Linux/Wayland). The project prioritizes simplicity, cross-platform compatibility, and open communication.

summary.en: A personal portfolio and blog built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, managed via Turborepo. Features MDX support, RSS, comments, view counters, and smooth animations with Motion. Delivers near-perfect Lighthouse scores in performance, SEO, and accessibility.

metadata.name: mcp-chrome

summary.en: Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling automation, content analysis, and semantic search. It runs locally, supports cross-tab operations, integrates 20+ tools, and uses SIMD-accelerated AI for faster vector processing.

summary.en: GPT-SoVITS is a powerful few-shot voice conversion and text-to-speech (TTS) system that enables high-quality voice cloning with just 1 minute of training data. It supports zero-shot and few-shot inference, cross-lingual synthesis (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Cantonese), and includes a WebUI with tools for voice separation, dataset segmentation, and ASR. With fast inference (RTF as low as 0.014 on RTX 4090), it's ideal for personalized voice applications.

metadata.name: mcp-feedback-enhanced

summary.en: MCP Feedback Enhanced is an advanced MCP server designed for interactive user feedback and command execution in AI-assisted development. It features dual interfaces (Web UI & Desktop App), intelligent environment detection (SSH/WSL), cross-platform support, session tracking, auto-command execution, and rich Markdown summaries to boost development efficiency.

summary.en: Google AI Edge Gallery is an experimental app showcasing on-device generative AI use cases, enabling fully offline model execution on Android and iOS. Users can explore image understanding, audio transcription, prompt engineering, mini-games, and fine-tuned modelsâ€”all running locally without internet.

summary.en: This project demonstrates a fullstack app with a React frontend and a LangGraph-powered backend agent using Gemini 2.5. The agent dynamically generates search queries, performs web research via Google Search API, reflects on results to identify knowledge gaps, and iteratively refines searches to produce well-cited, comprehensive answersâ€”ideal for research-augmented conversational AI.

summary.en: Deep Research is a privacy-focused, AI-powered tool that generates in-depth research reports in minutes using various LLMs like Gemini, OpenAI, and Ollama. Deployable on Vercel and Cloudflare, it integrates SSE API and MCP server for flexible, secure, and fast research workflows.

summary.en: Open-Sora is an open-source initiative focused on efficient, high-quality video generation. The latest 2.0 version features an 11B-parameter model matching top-tier models in performance, with fully open training code and checkpoints, trained for only $200K, democratizing access to advanced video synthesis.

metadata.name: read-bridge

summary.en: MoneyPrinterTurbo is an AI-powered tool that automatically generates high-definition short videos from a single topic or keyword. metadata.name: FastGPT

summary.en: AnythingLLM is an all-in-one desktop and Docker AI application featuring built-in RAG, AI agents, a no-code agent builder, and MCP compatibility. It enables users to chat with documents by converting any content into LLM-usable context, with support for multi-user management and flexible LLM/vector database selection.

metadata.name: rag-web-ui

summary.en: RAG Web UI is an intelligent dialogue system leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology. It supports multi-format document ingestion, automatic chunking and vectorization, integrates with various LLMs (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama), and offers a frontend-backend separated architecture with high-performance vector databases (ChromaDB/Qdrant) and OpenAPI support for private knowledge base Q&A.

It aims to purify the browsing experience with routing rules, plugins, and icon resources, including IP spoofing support (e.g., for Douyin), while promoting open-source ethics and responsible usage.

summary.en: This is the world's largest free and open-source Midjourney API proxy platform, generating over 1 million images daily. It supports drawing via Discord and Youchuan, offering full-featured APIs, distributed deployment, account pool management, real-time task tracking, Chinese prompt translation, content filtering, and one-click face swapping for images and videos, with an integrated admin UI and Swagger docs.

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®åˆ©ç”¨æ‰©æ•£æ¨¡å‹ä¸ºé»‘ç™½å›¾åƒä¸Šè‰²ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨LABè‰²å½©ç©ºé—´åˆ†ç¦»äº®åº¦ä¸é¢œè‰²ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚æ¨¡å‹åŸºäºUNetæ¶æ„ï¼Œåœ¨è®­ç»ƒæ—¶ä»…å¯¹ABé¢œè‰²é€šé“åŠ å™ªï¼Œä¿ç•™Lé€šé“ä½œä¸ºæ¡ä»¶è¾“å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“åˆç°åº¦å›¾ç‰¹å¾è¿›è¡Œæ¡ä»¶åŒ–å»å™ªã€‚é¡¹ç›®å±•ç¤ºäº†å‰å‘æ‰©æ•£ä¸å»å™ªè¿‡ç¨‹çš„å¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå›¾åƒä¿®å¤ä¸å†å²å½±åƒå¤åŸç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: This project uses diffusion models to colorize grayscale images by leveraging the LAB color space, where the L channel (grayscale) is preserved and only the AB color channels are noised during training. A UNet-based model denoises the color channels conditioned on the L channel and extracted grayscale features, enabling realistic color restoration for applications like photo restoration and archival imaging.

summary.en: AigoTools is an open-source tool for quickly building and managing website directories, featuring auto-crawling, internationalization, SEO optimization, and multi-platform image storage (e.g., MinIO, AWS S3). It supports one-click deployment via Docker or Zeabur, ideal for creating custom navigation sites.

It integrates Giscus for comments and NuxtUI for UI, featuring full-text search, WYSIWYG Markdown editing, friend link screenshots, and SEO optimization, deployed on Zeabur with cost-efficient containerization.

summary.en: Pic Smaller is a client-side image compression tool supporting JPEG, PNG, WEBP, AVIF, SVG, and GIF. Built with Vite + React, it leverages OffscreenCanvas, WebAssembly, and Web Workers for fast, secure local processing without server dependency. Features include format conversion, color reduction, and a drag-to-compare preview, optimized for both desktop and mobile.

summary.en: QuickRecorder is a lightweight, high-performance screen recorder for macOS built on ScreenCapture Kit. It supports recording screens, windows, apps, and mobile devices with features like driver-free audio loopback, mouse highlighting, and screen magnifier. Compatible with macOS 12.3+, it enables HEVC with Alpha recording, real-time presenter overlay (macOS 14), and independent system/microphone audio track control for post-editing.

summary.en: Auto.js is an Android-based JavaScript automation IDE leveraging accessibility services for UI control operations, screenshot analysis, OCR, and on-device AI inference (YOLOv8, PaddleOCR, ONNXRuntime). This modified version fixes memory leaks, enhances Android 12 support, and integrates multiple inference engines for stable automation in apps like Ant Forest.

summary.zh: FunClip æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºã€ç²¾å‡†ä¸”æ˜“ç”¨çš„è§†é¢‘è¯­éŸ³è¯†åˆ«ä¸å‰ªè¾‘å·¥å…·ï¼ŒåŸºäºé˜¿é‡Œäº‘é€šä¹‰è¯­éŸ³å®éªŒå®¤çš„ FunASR æ¨¡å‹å®ç°é«˜ç²¾åº¦è¯­éŸ³è½¬å†™ï¼Œå¹¶æ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ LLM å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½å‰ªè¾‘ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·å¯è‡ªç”±é€‰æ‹©æ–‡æœ¬ç‰‡æ®µæˆ–æŒ‡å®šè¯´è¯äººè¿›è¡Œè§†é¢‘è£å‰ªï¼Œé›†æˆ Paraformerã€CAM++ ç­‰å·¥ä¸šçº§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸­è‹±æ–‡è¯†åˆ«ã€çƒ­è¯å¢å¼ºä¸å¤šæ®µå‰ªè¾‘ï¼Œæä¾› Gradio äº¤äº’ç•Œé¢ï¼Œé€‚åˆæœ¬åœ°éƒ¨ç½²ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨è®¿é—®ã€‚
summary.en: FunClip is an open-source, accurate, and user-friendly video speech recognition and clipping tool powered by Alibaba's FunASR models. It enables precise ASR with timestamp prediction, supports LLM-based intelligent clipping via Qwen/GPT, allows speaker-specific trimming using CAM++, and offers hotword customization. With Gradio interface, it supports multi-segment clipping, SRT subtitle export, and local/server deployment for both Chinese and English content.

It handles JavaScript rendering, dynamic content, media parsing (PDFs, DOCX, images), batch processing, and user actions like clicks and scrolls, offering high reliability and customization for AI agents and knowledge systems.

summary.en: MediaCrawler is a multi-platform content scraping tool powered by Playwright, supporting data collection from major Chinese social platforms like Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Kuaishou, Bilibili, Weibo, Tieba, and Zhihu. summary.en: How To Ask Questions The Smart Way is a classic guide by Eric S. Raymond on how to effectively ask technical questions to get useful answers. metadata.name: Open-Assistant

summary.en: kafka-python is a full-featured Python client for Apache Kafka, compatible with versions 0.8 to 4.0. summary.en: django-notifications is a Django app mimicking GitHub's notification system, designed for user-centric event alerts. summary.en: A Telegram bot designed to distribute localized language files for Telegram clients. It allows uploading translation files, retrieving file IDs, and assigning them to Android, iOS, or Desktop platforms via simple commands, streamlining the localization workflow.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯çš„â€œç²˜æ€§â€æé†’ï¼Œç›´è‡³ç”¨æˆ·ä¸»åŠ¨æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»ï¼›åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤ä¼šè¯æœºåˆ¶ã€‚æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œæ”¯æŒå±å¹•å±•ç¤ºä¸é‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œå¢å¼ºæ¶ˆæ¯è§¦è¾¾ç‡ã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages extends Django's messaging framework to support persistent, cross-session user notifications. Authenticated users' messages are stored in the database and remain visible until marked as read, while anonymous users rely on session-based storage. It offers a unified API for both user types and supports on-screen display and email notifications.

metadata.name: django-persistent-messages
metadata.description: My independent fork of django-persistent-messages. A Django app for unified and persistent user messages/notifications, built on top of Django's messages framework

summary.zh: Django Persistent Messages æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Django æ¶ˆæ¯æ¡†æ¶çš„æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸è®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å­˜å‚¨äºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯ä¿ç•™ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›æ ‡è®°å·²è¯»ã€åˆ é™¤ç­‰äº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·ä»ä½¿ç”¨ä¼šè¯å­˜å‚¨ã€‚è¯¥åº”ç”¨æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€ APIï¼Œå…¼å®¹ Django åŸç”Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¾¿äºé›†æˆã€‚
summary.en: Django Persistent Messages is a Django app extending the built-in messages framework to support persistent user notifications. It stores messages in the database for authenticated users, enabling cross-session persistence with features like marking as read or deletion. Anonymous users use session-based storage. Offers a unified API compatible with Django's native messaging system.

metadata.name: django-monitio
metadata.description: Unified, persistent user messages with live notifications via SSE for Django.

summary.zh: django-monitio æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º Django æä¾›æŒä¹…åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸å®æ—¶é€šçŸ¥çš„æ‰©å±•ï¼ŒåŸºäº Redis å’Œ SSE å®ç°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ¨é€ã€‚æ”¯æŒè®¤è¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°æ®åº“æŒä¹…åŒ–æ¶ˆæ¯ã€åŒ¿åç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œå¹¶é›†æˆé‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é¡¹ç›®ä¾èµ– django-sseã€django-redis ç­‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºéœ€è¦è·¨ä¼šè¯æ¶ˆæ¯ç®¡ç†çš„ Web åº”ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: django-monitio is a Django extension for persistent user messages and live notifications via Server-Sent Events (SSE), backed by Redis. It supports database-stored messages for authenticated users and session-based messages for anonymous users, with optional email delivery. Built on django-sse and django-redis, it enables cross-session message management in web applications.

metadata.name: wallop

summary.en: Wallop is a minimal (4KB), dependency-free JavaScript library for showing and hiding elements, ideal for sliders and carousels. It manages state by adding semantic CSS classes, with animations handled entirely in CSS. It supports mobile-first design, progressive enhancement, custom events, and offers flexible APIs with built-in animation modifiers.

summary.en: qiandao is an automated check-in framework based on HAR editor, enabling multi-site auto-check-in via templates. It offers a web interface and CLI tool, supports Docker deployment, requires Python 3.11, and optionally uses Redis or MySQL. Users can upload custom templates, with admin approval for public sharing, ideal for batch website check-in management.

summary.en: GetCookies is a Chrome extension that bypasses HTTP ONLY restrictions to retrieve cookies from specified domains. It triggers via buttons with custom data attributes, supports filtering by domain and cookie name, and returns cookie data in JSON format through message event callbacks, ideal for automation tasks like daily check-ins.

summary.en: Hexo is a fast, simple, and powerful blog framework powered by Node.js. It supports GitHub Flavored Markdown, offers one-command deployment to platforms like GitHub Pages, and features a rich ecosystem of themes and plugins for building static blogs efficiently.

summary.en: Django is a high-level Python web framework designed for perfectionists with deadlines. It promotes rapid development, clean architecture, and secure deployment, featuring built-in ORM, authentication, and admin interface for scalable enterprise applications.

metadata.name: GeekBlog

summary.en: GeekBlog is a full-featured blog system built on Django 1.6.5, supporting dual database storage with MySQL and MongoDB. It integrates UEditor for rich text editing, Duoshuo for comments, and enhances Django Admin with django-admin-tools. Features include responsive design, static asset optimization via Django Pipeline, RSS feeds, and sitemap generation.

summary.en: django-guardian is a Django extension that implements per-object permissions on top of Django's built-in authentication system. It enables fine-grained access control by allowing permissions to be assigned to users or groups for specific model instances, with seamless integration into Django Admin via GuardedModelAdmin.

metadata.name: heretic

summary.zh: Heretic æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäºæ–¹å‘æ€§æ¶ˆè(abliteration)çš„å…¨è‡ªåŠ¨è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹å®¡æŸ¥ç§»é™¤å·¥å…·ï¼Œç»“åˆ Optuna TPE å‚æ•°ä¼˜åŒ–å™¨ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ååŒæœ€å°åŒ–æ‹’ç»ç‡ä¸ KL æ•£åº¦è‡ªåŠ¨å¯»æ‰¾é«˜è´¨é‡æ¶ˆèå‚æ•°ã€‚æ— éœ€äººå·¥å¹²é¢„å³å¯ç”Ÿæˆä½èƒ½åŠ›æŸå¤±çš„è§£å®¡æŸ¥æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œåœ¨ gemma-3-12b-it ä¸Šå®ç° 3/100 æ‹’ç»ç‡åŒæ—¶ä¿æŒä»… 0.16 çš„ KL æ•£åº¦ï¼Œä¼˜äºäººå·¥ä¸“å®¶æ¶ˆèæ•ˆæœã€‚
summary.en: Heretic is a fully automatic censorship removal tool for language models using directional abliteration combined with Optuna TPE-based optimizer. It co-minimizes refusals and KL divergence to automatically find high-quality abliteration parameters without human intervention. On gemma-3-12b-it, it achieves 3/100 refusal rate with only 0.16 KL divergence, outperforming manual expert abliterations.

It packages Go code with frontend into a single executable, using native rendering engines instead of embedded browsers. Like rsync for Docker images, it enables efficient A-to-B image migration for development and deployment workflows.

summary.en: AFFiNE is an open-source next-gen knowledge management platform that deeply integrates docs, whiteboard, and database into one workspace. summary.en: 1MCP is a unified Model Context Protocol server that aggregates multiple MCP servers into a single endpoint. It features OAuth 2.1 authentication, stdio transport isolation, input sanitization, and audit logging. With high-performance request forwarding and hot-reload configuration, it simplifies integration with AI clients like Claude Desktop, Cursor, and VSCode through built-in health monitoring.

summary.en: Garage is an S3-compatible distributed object storage service designed for small-to-medium scale self-hosting. It supports geo-distributed deployments across multiple physical locations, ensuring high availability even when some servers are unreachable. Key advantages include lightweight architecture, easy operation, and AGPLv3 open-source licensing.

summary.en: MCP Router is a desktop application for unified management of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. Cross-platform support for Windows and macOS, with CLI tools for quick integration with AI clients like Claude, Cline, and Cursor.

summary.en: term.everything is a Linux CLI tool that runs any GUI application in the terminal. It's a from-scratch Wayland compositor that outputs graphical windows to the terminal instead of the display. Supports X11 and Wayland host systems, enables remote GUI transmission over SSH, and can run Firefox, games, or even entire desktop environments in a terminal.

Designed for AI integration, it enables building microservices, RESTful APIs, and CLI tools with clean, efficient code. Version 1.7.18.

summary.en: Postgres MCP Pro is an open-source Model Context Protocol server providing comprehensive PostgreSQL support for AI agents. Supporting 20+ AI models, it offers bilingual translation, context-aware translation, selection translation, subtitle translation, and TTS voice reading to enhance language skills during web browsing.

It delivers exceptional performance through Static Site Generation (SSG) and Server-Side Rendering (SSR), while supporting seamless integration with React, Vue, Svelte, Preact, Solid and other popular UI frameworks.

summary.en: System Informer is a free and open-source Windows system monitoring and debugging tool offering process management, network connection monitoring, disk I/O tracking, and kernel-level stack analysis. Portable and installation-free, it's an essential assistant for system administrators and security researchers.

Implements Durable Objects for state consistency, provides RESTful API, supports 5-minute integration, and prioritizes user privacy with zero tracking or data collection.

metadata.name: context-engineering-intro
metadata.description: Context engineering is the new vibe coding - it's the way to actually make AI coding assistants work. Claude Code is the best for this so that's what this repo is centered around, but you can apply this strategy with any AI coding assistant!

summary.en: Context Engineering is a systematic methodology for providing comprehensive context to AI coding assistants through CLAUDE.md project rules, INITIAL.md feature requests, PRP (Product Requirements Prompts), and code examples. This template offers a standardized workflow that dramatically enhances AI code generation quality and consistency, enabling end-to-end complex task execution.

summary.en: RustFS is a high-performance, distributed object storage system built in Rust with full S3 compatibility. It delivers 2.3x faster performance than MinIO for 4KB object payloads and supports seamless migration and coexistence with other S3-compatible platforms like MinIO and Ceph. Licensed under Apache 2.0, it's optimized for data lakes, AI, and big data workloads with scalable and fault-tolerant architecture.

summary.en: An intelligent voice chatbot based on MCP protocol, powered by large models like Qwen/DeepSeek. summary.en: Monibuca is a high-performance streaming server framework written entirely in Go, featuring lock-free design and manual memory management for high concurrency. It supports RTMP, RTSP, HLS, WebRTC, GB28181, SRT protocols with a plugin-based architecture, enabling real-time transcoding, recording, playback, time-shifting, and AI inference for live streaming, surveillance, and video conferencing scenarios.

Features keyframe caching, distributed load balancing, RESTful API, and web management interface, supporting X86/ARM/RISC-V architectures for video surveillance, live streaming, and IoT video transmission.

summary.en: Nature is a self-developed general-purpose system programming language implemented in pure C, compiling directly to native machine code without LLVM. It supports cross-platform compilation (x64/arm64/riscv64) with strong typing, built-in concurrency primitives (go/channel/select), high-performance GC, shared-stack coroutines, and tcmalloc-style allocator, featuring built-in data structures and centralized package management for safe, reliable, high-performance software development.

Features vault mounting, Git plugin support, custom fonts, and Nginx reverse proxy deployment. Ideal for remote work and cross-device note synchronization, delivering a full desktop experience in browsers using NoVNC technology.

summary.en: A C++ implementation of the HAT-trie data structure based on the 2007 paper, providing htrie_map and htrie_set containers. It achieves low memory usage and efficient lookups by compressing common prefixes into array hash nodes. Supports prefix search, prefix erasure, longest prefix matching, and serialization. Ideal for large-scale string storage and autocomplete scenarios. Header-only library.

Supports A-shares, Hong Kong and US stock markets with price alerts and local data storage, compatible with DeepSeek, OpenAI, Ollama and other LLM APIs.

Pretrained on 15T high-quality data with RL post-training, it achieves GPT-4o-level performance in code generation, function calling, and instruction following while supporting local deployment.

Supports second-level scheduling, interruptible execution, and task orchestration with comprehensive permission management and alerting. Provides multi-language clients including Java, Python, and Go.

Goal: to be the simplest and most powerful Java type conversion tool.

It includes built-in image hosting, analytics, and comment system. The powerful Markdown editor supports charts, math formulas, and emoji. summary.en: ChatGLM3 is an open-source bilingual dialogue LLM series developed by Zhipu AI and Tsinghua University KEG Lab. ChatGLM3-6B features a newly designed Prompt format with native support for function calling, code execution, and agent tasks. It demonstrates exceptional performance across semantic, mathematical, reasoning, code, and knowledge benchmarks, recognized as the strongest base model under 10B parameters. The series includes Base, 32K, and 128K long-context variants, fully open for academic research and commercial use with registration.

summary.en: Monolith is a Rust-powered CLI tool that saves complete web pages as single HTML files. It embeds all CSS, images, and JavaScript as data URLs, producing standalone offline-ready HTML5 documents. Unlike wget, it preserves exact visual rendering for web archiving and offline storage.

summary.en: Metabase is an open-source Business Intelligence and Embedded Analytics tool that enables non-technical users to query data and gain insights through a visual interface without knowing SQL. It supports multiple databases, creates interactive dashboards, data models, and custom metrics, with a React SDK for embedding analytics components into third-party applications.

summary.en: VideoCaptioner is an LLM-powered video subtitle processing tool featuring ASR, intelligent sentence segmentation, correction, and translation. It supports local Whisper offline recognition and API calls, leveraging LLM semantic understanding for natural subtitle restructuring with word-level timestamps, VAD detection, batch processing, and an intuitive editing interface.

summary.en: Kong Gateway is a cloud-native API/LLM/MCP gateway renowned for high performance and plugin extensibility. It provides proxying, routing, load balancing, health checking, authentication and more, with multi-LLM support, semantic security, and MCP traffic analytics. Native Kubernetes Ingress Controller support makes it ideal for microservices and AI traffic management.

Supports PageHelper 6.x with advanced features including async count, automatic dialect detection, and extensible SQL parsers, compatible with Spring Boot 3.x and JDK17+.

metadata.name: gunrock
metadata.description: Programmable CUDA/C++ GPU Graph Analytics

summary.zh: Gunrockæ˜¯é«˜æ€§èƒ½GPUå›¾åˆ†æåº“ï¼Œæ”¯æŒNVIDIA CUDAå’ŒAMD ROCm/HIPåŒå¹³å°ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨å‰æ²¿ä¸­å¿ƒçš„æ•°æ®ä¸­å¿ƒæŠ½è±¡å’Œç»†ç²’åº¦è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œåœ¨é«˜æ€§èƒ½ä¸å¯ç¼–ç¨‹æ€§ä¹‹é—´è¾¾åˆ°å¹³è¡¡ã€‚å¼€å‘è€…å¯å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å‘æ–°å›¾åŸè¯­ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå•GPUåˆ°å¤šGPUæ‰©å±•ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºç¤¾äº¤ç½‘ç»œåˆ†æã€è·¯å¾„è§„åˆ’ç­‰å¤§è§„æ¨¡å›¾è®¡ç®—åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Gunrock is a high-performance GPU graph analytics library supporting both NVIDIA CUDA and AMD ROCm/HIP platforms. It employs a frontier-centric, data-centric abstraction with fine-grained load balancing, achieving optimal balance between performance and programmability. Developers can rapidly develop new graph primitives with support for scaling from single to multi-GPU, ideal for large-scale graph computing like social network analysis and route planning.

Built on ZXing-C++ library, supporting formats like AZTEC, CODE 128, QR CODE, PDF417, with deep link integration.

summary.en: Spring Startup Analyzer collects application startup data including Bean initialization, method invocations, and thread execution to generate interactive visualization reports with Bean details, timeline, and flame graphs, helping developers identify performance bottlenecks. It also provides async Bean initialization components that execute init and @PostConstruct methods asynchronously to significantly improve startup speed.

Features error index navigation, regex search, text highlighting, filtering, time histogram visualization, and SQLite log analysisâ€”smarter than traditional tail/grep/less for log processing.

It offers out-of-the-box nodes, edges, controls, and mini-maps for building workflow editors, flowcharts, and chatbot interfaces with seamless customization and extensibility.

summary.en: A runtime console tool for Java developers that injects into target JVM processes via JavaAgent without code modification. It provides a built-in Web management interface for executing Groovy scripts to perform dynamic code debugging, runtime variable inspection, and business logic verification.

summary.en: Delta is a Rust-based syntax-highlighting pager for git diff, grep, and blame output. It provides word-level diff highlighting using Levenshtein edit inference, side-by-side view with line numbering, enhanced merge conflict display, and terminal hyperlinks. Features 20+ customizable styles using bat's syntax themes, supports diff-highlight/diff-so-fancy emulation, and auto-detects terminal color schemes.

summary.en: A comprehensive China administrative division data collection project providing province/city/district/township-level data from multiple sources including NBS, Ministry of Civil Affairs, Amap and Tencent Maps. Features CSV files with pinyin annotations, coordinates and boundary ranges, supporting conversion to JSON/multi-level JS, with tools exporting to shp, geojson, sql formats for map visualization and geolocation applications.

summary.en: Phoenix Architecture is an open-source technical documentation focusing on building reliable distributed software systems, covering modern architectural patterns including microservices, service mesh, and serverless. It provides companion demo projects and systematically organizes design principles and practices for enterprise-level distributed systems.

summary.en: ChirmyRam's OneDrive repository hosting ~170TB of movies, anime, e-books, and 4K content. Built with alist (Golang), supports WebDAV protocol for local player mounting with multi-account load balancing. Currently experiencing frequent API throttling due to high traffic, intended for learning exchange only.

metadata.name: cryptomator

summary.en: Cryptomator is an open-source cross-platform client-side encryption tool for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It provides transparent encryption for cloud storage through a virtual encrypted filesystem using AES-256 encryption with Scrypt key derivation, protecting file content and names while supporting major cloud services like Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive.

metadata.name: CasaOS

summary.en: CasaOS is an open-source personal cloud system that enables users to quickly deploy private cloud services on home servers or single-board computers through a simple, elegant web interface. It supports file management, app store, Docker container deployment, reducing reliance on commercial SaaS and achieving data autonomy.

metadata.name: helium

summary.en: Helium is a Python browser automation library built on Selenium that lets users locate elements using visible text labels (like button names) instead of HTML IDs or XPaths, making scripts shorter and more readable. Compared to pure Selenium, code is reduced by 30-50%, with built-in iFrame handling, smart window management, and implicit waiting.

summary.en: Local Path Provisioner is a Kubernetes dynamic storage provisioner developed by Rancher that automatically creates hostPath or local persistent volumes on nodes. It simplifies Kubernetes' native Local Persistent Volume feature, providing an easier local storage solution for cloud-native applications requiring high performance or cost-effective storage.

metadata.name: gdu

summary.en: Gdu is a fast disk usage analyzer written in Go, optimized for SSDs to leverage parallel processing, while also supporting HDDs. It features an interactive console interface with capabilities including directory exclusion, symlink following, cross-filesystem scanning, and database storage for analysis results, ideal for disk space management in servers and desktops.

summary.en: A visual PDF comparison tool that highlights differences between two PDF files by generating a diff PDF or displaying an interactive GUI viewer for side-by-side comparison. Supports page shifting with Ctrl+arrows to identify translation-only changes. Returns exit code 0/1 to indicate differences. Built with wxWidgets, Cairo and Poppler, cross-platform on Windows, macOS and Linux.

summary.en: nvm (Node Version Manager) is a POSIX-compliant bash script for managing multiple active Node.js versions via command line. It supports automatic version switching via .nvmrc files, provides shell integration for bash/zsh/fish, and is compatible with Linux, macOS, WSL, and Alpine Linux. CII Best Practices certified, it's the de facto standard tool for Node.js version management.

metadata.name: focalboard
metadata.description: Focalboard is an open source, self-hosted alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.

summary.zh: Focalboardæ˜¯Mattermostç¤¾åŒºå¼€æºçš„é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼Œæä¾›çœ‹æ¿å¼ä»»åŠ¡ç®¡ç†ã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯Trelloã€Notionå’ŒAsanaçš„å¼€æºæ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šè¯­è¨€ã€è·¨å¹³å°ï¼ˆWindows/Mac/Linuxï¼‰ï¼Œå¯è‡ªæ‰˜ç®¡éƒ¨ç½²ã€‚æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆå†…ç½®SQLiteæ•°æ®åº“ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ç‰ˆæ”¯æŒå¤šç”¨æˆ·åä½œï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººä»»åŠ¡å’Œå›¢é˜Ÿé¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†ã€‚
summary.en: Focalboard is an open source project management tool by the Mattermost community, featuring Kanban-style task organization. As an open source alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana, it supports multilingual interfaces and cross-platform deployment (Windows/Mac/Linux) with self-hosting capability. The desktop edition uses embedded SQLite, while the server edition enables multi-user collaboration for personal and team project management.

metadata.name: redis
metadata.description: Native port of Redis for Windows. Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes, Streams, HyperLogLogs. This repository contains unofficial port of Redis to Windows.

Built upon the MS Open Tech fork, compiled with Visual Studio 2019, featuring customized jemalloc allocator to enable fork-based RDB/AOF persistence on Windows. summary.en: Tiny RDM is a modern lightweight Redis desktop client built with Wails framework, supporting Mac, Windows and Linux. Built on Webview2 without embedded browsers, it offers light/dark themes, SSH tunnel, SSL, Sentinel/Cluster mode support, visual CRUD for all Redis data types, SCAN-based pagination for millions of keys, real-time command monitoring, Monaco Editor integration, and custom encoder/decoder functionality.

summary.en: AnyText is a diffusion-based multilingual visual text generation and editing framework, featuring an auxiliary latent module and text embedding module to produce text seamlessly integrated with backgrounds. It uses text-control diffusion loss and text perceptual loss to enhance writing accuracy, supporting generation, editing and community model weight merging. Accepted as ICLR 2024 Spotlight.

summary.en: Open-source video translation and AI dubbing tool that automates the entire workflow: speech recognition, subtitle translation, and AI voice synthesis. Features voice cloning via F5-TTS and GPT-SoVITS, with per-speaker voice assignment, interactive proofreading, and CLI mode for video localization and multilingual content production.

summary.en: A GUI tool for image, video, and GIF super-resolution enlargement using deep CNNs. Supports 10+ AI algorithms including Waifu2x, Real-ESRGAN, Real-CUGAN, and RTX VSR with full AMD/Nvidia/Intel GPU compatibility. Includes Magisk variants (Stable/Canary/Alpha/Delta/Lite), APatch root solution, LSPosed/EDXposed/Dreamland frameworks, andå…Root solutions like TaiChi. summary.en: PM2 is a production-grade process manager for Node.js/Bun with built-in load balancing. It provides daemonization, zero-downtime reload, clustering, and container support. The de facto standard for Node.js production deployments with simple commands for process management and monitoring.

It includes 15+ benchmarks like TPC-C, TPC-H, YCSB, with multi-threaded load generation and granular performance metrics for database comparison and optimization research.

summary.en: A production-ready Rust web application template built with Axum, featuring Sea-Query ORM and modql for flexible query filtering. Includes declarative CRUD macros to reduce boilerplate, ModelManager with database transaction support, and demonstrates multi-tenant architecture using Org/Space constructs for building enterprise collaboration platforms.

It supports regex-powered custom parsers and flexible templating, fitting into various release workflows and adopted by many open-source projects.

metadata.name: shardingsphere

summary.en: Apache ShardingSphere is an enterprise-grade distributed database middleware ecosystem providing distributed SQL, horizontal sharding, read-write splitting, distributed transactions, and database governance. Its pluggable architecture supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and other databases, enabling elastic data scaling and unified heterogeneous database management.

summary.en: GPT4All is an open-source project enabling users to run large language models locally on everyday desktops and laptops without API calls or GPUs. Built on llama.cpp, it supports Windows, macOS and Linux with Python bindings, available for commercial use. The latest version supports DeepSeek R1 distillations.

metadata.name: cheat
metadata.description: cheat allows you to create and view interactive cheatsheets on the command-line. It was designed to help remind *nix system administrators of options for commands that they use frequently, but not frequently enough to remember.

summary.zh: cheat æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‘½ä»¤è¡Œäº¤äº’å¼é€ŸæŸ¥è¡¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¸®åŠ© Linux/Unix ç³»ç»Ÿç®¡ç†å‘˜å¿«é€ŸæŸ¥é˜…å¸¸ç”¨ä½†ä¸å¸¸è®°ä½çš„å‘½ä»¤é€‰é¡¹ã€‚æ”¯æŒ YAML å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®å®šä¹‰æ ‡ç­¾å’Œè¯­æ³•é«˜äº®ï¼ˆåŸºäº Chromaï¼‰ï¼Œæä¾›å¤šè·¯å¾„ç®¡ç†ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­›é€‰å’Œæ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ç¤¾åŒºæä¾›å¤§é‡å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤é€ŸæŸ¥è¡¨ï¼Œå¼€ç®±å³ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: cheat is a CLI tool for creating and viewing interactive cheatsheets, designed to help *nix sysadmins recall command options they use frequently but can't remember. It supports YAML frontmatter for tags and syntax highlighting via Chroma, offers multiple cheatpaths, tag filtering, and regex search with community-sourced sheets available.

metadata.name: portainer
metadata.description: Making Docker and Kubernetes management easy.

summary.zh: Portaineræ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè½»é‡çº§å®¹å™¨ç®¡ç†å¹³å°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒDockerã€Swarmã€Kuberneteså’ŒACIç¯å¢ƒã€‚é€šè¿‡ç›´è§‚çš„Web GUIå’ŒRESTful APIï¼Œç”¨æˆ·å¯ç»Ÿä¸€ç®¡ç†å®¹å™¨ã€é•œåƒã€å·ã€ç½‘ç»œç­‰èµ„æºã€‚éƒ¨ç½²ç®€ä¾¿ï¼Œä»…éœ€å•ä¸ªå®¹å™¨å³å¯è¿è¡Œäºä»»æ„é›†ç¾¤ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒLinuxå’ŒWindowså®¹å™¨ç¯å¢ƒã€‚
summary.en: Portainer is a lightweight service delivery platform for managing Docker, Swarm, Kubernetes, and ACI environments. It provides an intuitive web GUI and extensive API to manage containers, images, volumes, and networks. Deployed as a single container, it runs on any cluster across Linux and Windows.

metadata.name: cassandra
metadata.description: Apache CassandraÂ®

summary.zh: Apache Cassandraæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾é«˜åº¦å¯æ‰©å±•çš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼NoSQLæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨åˆ†åŒºè¡Œå­˜å‚¨æ¶æ„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæ•°æ®åœ¨å¤šå°æœºå™¨é—´é€æ˜åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚æä¾›ç±»SQLçš„CQLæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­è¨€ï¼Œå…·å¤‡é«˜å¯ç”¨ã€æ— å•ç‚¹æ•…éšœã€å¤šæ•°æ®ä¸­å¿ƒéƒ¨ç½²ç­‰ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºéœ€è¦å¤§è§„æ¨¡ã€é«˜å¯ç”¨æ€§æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨çš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Apache Cassandra is a highly scalable distributed NoSQL database featuring partitioned row storage that transparently distributes data across multiple machines. With a SQL-like CQL query language, it offers high availability, no single point of failure, and multi-datacenter deployment support, ideal for large-scale distributed applications requiring resilient data storage.

summary.en: A web-based collection of 80+ developer tools including JSON formatting, encoding/decoding, encryption, date calculators, and more. Built with Vue3 and TypeScript, supports Docker self-hosting, focused on exceptional UX.

metadata.name: ZLMediaKit
metadata.description: WebRTC/RTSP/RTMP/HTTP/HLS/HTTP-FLV/WebSocket-FLV/HTTP-TS/HTTP-fMP4/WebSocket-TS/WebSocket-fMP4/GB28181/SRT/STUN/TURN server and client framework based on C++11

summary.en: ZLMediaKit is a high-performance C++11 streaming media server framework supporting WebRTC/RTSP/RTMP/HLS/GB28181 and other 10+ protocols with inter-protocol conversion. Built with multi-threaded async IO architecture, it handles 100K+ concurrent connections with ultra-low latency down to 100ms. Offers complete MediaServer and C API SDK across all platforms, proven in production environments.

metadata.name: signoz
metadata.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability platform native to OpenTelemetry with logs, traces and metrics in a single application. An open-source alternative to DataDog, NewRelic, etc. ğŸ”¥ ğŸ–¥.   ğŸ‘‰  Open source Application Performance Monitoring (APM) & Observability tool

summary.zh: SigNozæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€æºå¯è§‚æµ‹æ€§å¹³å°ï¼ŒåŸç”Ÿæ”¯æŒOpenTelemetryï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€é›†æˆæ—¥å¿—ã€è¿½è¸ªå’ŒæŒ‡æ ‡ä¸‰å¤§åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨ClickHouseå­˜å‚¨æ—¥å¿—æ•°æ®ï¼Œæä¾›å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„APMå›¾è¡¨ï¼ˆp99å»¶è¿Ÿã€é”™è¯¯ç‡ã€Apdexç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåˆ†å¸ƒå¼è¿½è¸ªçš„Flamegraphså’ŒGantt Chartså¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œæ˜¯DataDogã€NewRelicç­‰å•†ä¸šæ–¹æ¡ˆçš„å¼€æºæ›¿ä»£å“ã€‚
summary.en: SigNoz is an open-source observability platform native to OpenTelemetry, unifying logs, traces, and metrics in a single application. It uses ClickHouse for high-performance log storage and provides out-of-box APM metrics including p99 latency, error rate, and Apdex. Distributed tracing features Flamegraphs and Gantt Charts for request flow visualization, serving as an open-source alternative to Datadog and New Relic.

This project implements UI translation by modifying app.asar files (renderer.js, main.js, etc.) in the Electron application, supporting versions from 0.15.3 to the latest compatible release, with an Optimize version available. summary.en: Forest is a declarative HTTP client framework for Java that transforms HTTP requests into local interface method calls via annotations, decoupling business logic from HTTP protocols. Supporting dual backend engines (HttpClient/OkHttp), it provides enterprise features including JSON/XML/Protobuf serialization, interceptors, and OAuth2 authentication with seamless Spring Boot integration.

summary.en: Dante Cloud is China's first enterprise-grade cloud-native microservice base supporting both blocking and reactive services. Built with DDD design, it focuses on high-quality code and low security vulnerabilities. Supports IoT device authentication, meets China's Level-3 security protection requirements, and enables SM digital envelope encryption. Unique in allowing flexible switching between microservices and monolithic architectures with a single codebase.

summary.en: REST Assured is a Java DSL that simplifies REST API testing by bringing the expressiveness of dynamic languages into the Java domain. It supports JSON/XML response validation, parameters, headers, cookies and body assertions, includes built-in JsonPath and XmlPath parsers, offers multiple authentication mechanisms like Basic and OAuth, and integrates with Spring Framework for MockMvc testing.

summary.en: DeepSeek-Coder is a series of specialized code large language models developed by DeepSeek, trained from scratch on 2T tokens with sizes ranging from 1B to 33B parameters. Featuring a 16K context window and fill-in-the-blank tasks, it enables project-level code completion and infilling. It outperforms CodeLlama and other open-source models on HumanEval, MBPP, and DS-1000 benchmarks, achieving competitive performance with GPT-3.5.

summary.en: LocalStack is a local AWS cloud service emulator running in Docker containers, providing a fully functional local AWS stack. It supports dozens of AWS services including Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, and Kinesis, enabling developers to build and test cloud applications and serverless functions offline without real AWS credentials, significantly improving development velocity and reducing cloud costs.

summary.en: Alibaba's open-source embedded Java dynamic scripting engine derived from e-commerce business rules. Built on Antlr4, it supports custom functions/operators, native JSON syntax, and expression execution tracing. Features secure sandbox, functional programming, and Lambda expressions with interpreted execution that doesn't occupy JVM metaspace, ideal for coupon rules, workflow engines, and advertising billing scenarios.

metadata.name: flink-cdc
metadata.description: Flink CDC is a streaming data integration tool

summary.zh: Flink CDCæ˜¯Apacheå¼€æºçš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼æµå¼æ•°æ®é›†æˆå·¥å…·ï¼Œé€šè¿‡YAMLå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®ç®¡é“å®ç°æ•°æ®åº“å˜æ›´çš„å®æ—¶æ•è·ä¸åŒæ­¥ã€‚æ”¯æŒå…¨åº“åŒæ­¥ã€åˆ†åº“åˆ†è¡¨åŒæ­¥ã€Schemaæ¼”è¿›å’Œæ•°æ®è½¬æ¢ï¼Œå¯å°†MySQLç­‰æºæ•°æ®åº“å®æ—¶åŒæ­¥è‡³Dorisç­‰ç›®æ ‡ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ»¡è¶³å®æ—¶æ•°ä»“å»ºè®¾ä¸æ•°æ®æ¹–ä»“ä¸€ä½“åŒ–éœ€æ±‚ã€‚
summary.en: Apache Flink CDC is a distributed streaming data integration tool that captures real-time database changes via YAML-defined pipelines. It supports full database synchronization, sharded table sync, schema evolution, and data transformation, enabling real-time data movement from sources like MySQL to targets such as Doris for real-time data warehouse and lakehouse architectures.

metadata.name: rocksdb
metadata.description: A library that provides an embeddable, persistent key-value store for fast storage.

summary.zh: RocksDBæ˜¯Facebookå¼€æºçš„åµŒå…¥å¼æŒä¹…åŒ–é”®å€¼å­˜å‚¨åº“ï¼ŒåŸºäºLSMæ ‘ç»“æ„è®¾è®¡ï¼Œé’ˆå¯¹Flashå’ŒRAMå­˜å‚¨è¿›è¡Œä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚å®ƒæä¾›å†™å…¥æ”¾å¤§å› å­ã€è¯»å–æ”¾å¤§å› å­å’Œç©ºé—´æ”¾å¤§å› å­ä¹‹é—´çš„çµæ´»æƒè¡¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šçº¿ç¨‹å‹ç¼©ï¼Œå¯é«˜æ•ˆå¤„ç†TBçº§æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºæ•°æ®åº“å¼•æ“ã€ç¼“å­˜ç³»ç»Ÿç­‰é«˜æ€§èƒ½å­˜å‚¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: RocksDB is Facebook's open-source embedded persistent key-value store built on LSM-tree architecture, optimized for Flash and RAM storage. It offers flexible tradeoffs between Write-Amplification-Factor, Read-Amplification-Factor and Space-Amplification-Factor, supporting multi-threaded compaction to efficiently handle terabyte-scale data across database engines and caching systems.

summary.en: MooTool is a cross-platform developer toolkit featuring code note-taking with syntax highlighting, JSON processing, HTTP requests, encoding/decoding, encryption/decryption, timestamp conversion, QR codes, calculator, network tools, and color picker. Built with JavaFX, it runs on Windows, Linux, and macOS.

metadata.name: rocketmq-flink
metadata.description: RocketMQ integration for Apache Flink. This module includes the RocketMQ source and sink that allows a flink job to either write messages into a topic or read from topics in a flink job.

summary.zh: RocketMQ-Flinkæ˜¯Apache RocketMQä¸Apache Flinkçš„å®˜æ–¹é›†æˆæ¨¡å—ï¼Œæä¾›Sourceå’ŒSinkè¿æ¥å™¨å®ç°ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å—åŸºäºPull Consumeræ¨¡å¼å®ç°Sourceï¼Œæ”¯æŒFlink Checkpointä¸‹çš„Exactly-Onceè¯­ä¹‰ï¼›Sinkç«¯é€šè¿‡æ‰¹é‡åˆ·æ–°æœºåˆ¶æä¾›At-Least-Onceå¯é æ€§ä¿è¯ã€‚å†…ç½®é€šç”¨åºåˆ—åŒ–Schemaå’ŒTopicSelectoræ¥å£ï¼Œå¼€å‘è€…å¯çµæ´»å®šä¹‰æ¶ˆæ¯é”®å€¼å¯¹åºåˆ—åŒ–åŠTopic/Tagè·¯ç”±ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå®æ—¶æ•°æ®ç®¡é“ã€æµå¼ETLåŠäº‹ä»¶é©±åŠ¨æ¶æ„ç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: RocketMQ-Flink is the official integration module connecting Apache RocketMQ with Apache Flink, providing source and sink connectors for bidirectional data streaming. The source implements a pull-based consumer with exactly-once semantics when Flink checkpointing is enabled, while the sink guarantees at-least-once delivery through batch flush mechanisms. It offers flexible serialization schemas and topic selectors for custom key-value serialization and message routing, ideal for real-time data pipelines, streaming ETL, and event-driven architectures.

summary.en: Stable Diffusion WebUI extension for streamlined Civitai model management. Scans local models to generate SHA256 hashes and retrieve model info/previews from Civitai; downloads models directly via Civitai URL with resume support; checks for new versions; enhances Extra Network cards with trigger word and prompt shortcuts.

metadata.name: debezium
metadata.description: Change data capture for a variety of databases. Please log issues at https://github.com/debezium/dbz/issues.

summary.zh: Debeziumæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€æºçš„å˜æ›´æ•°æ®æ•è·(CDC)å¹³å°ï¼ŒåŸºäºKafka Connectæ„å»ºï¼Œå¯å®æ—¶ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®åº“å˜æ›´å¹¶ä»¥ä½å»¶è¿Ÿæµå¼ä¼ è¾“åˆ°Kafkaã€‚æ”¯æŒMySQLã€PostgreSQLã€MongoDBã€Oracleã€SQL Serverç­‰å¤šç§æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œæä¾›Exactly-Onceæˆ–At-Least-Onceè¯­ä¹‰ï¼Œç¡®ä¿äº‹ä»¶å¯é ä¼ é€’ä¸”åº”ç”¨å¯éšæ—¶é‡å¯æ¶ˆè´¹ã€‚
summary.en: Debezium is an open-source change data capture platform built on Kafka Connect that monitors databases in real-time and streams row-level changes to Kafka with low latency. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, SQL Server and more, providing exactly-once or at-least-once delivery semantics for reliable event streaming with fault tolerance.

summary.en: KeyDB is a high-performance Redis fork developed by Snap Inc, focusing on multithreading, memory efficiency, and high throughput. Beyond performance gains, it offers Active Replication, FLASH storage, and subkey expires. Its MVCC architecture enables non-blocking KEYS and SCAN operations while maintaining full Redis protocol and script compatibility as a seamless drop-in replacement.

summary.en: RocketMQ-MQTT extends Apache RocketMQ with MQTT protocol support, enabling message ingestion from IoT devices and mobile apps. Built on RocketMQ's unified storage engine with Light Message Queue (LMQ) integration, ideal for IoT and mobile messaging scenarios.

metadata.name: WinMemoryCleaner

summary.en: WinMemoryCleaner is a free Windows RAM cleaner that uses native Windows APIs to optimize memory areas by releasing improperly allocated memory, improving system performance. This portable application requires no installation but needs administrator privileges. It features auto-optimization, global hotkeys, system tray support, and multi-language interface, compatible with Windows XP to 11 and Server 2003 to 2025.

summary.en: dynamic-datasource-spring-boot-starter is a Spring Boot component by baomyelitis for dynamic multi-datasource management. Key features include datasource grouping (read-write separation, master-slave, hybrid mode), sensitive config encryption, dynamic add/remove datasources, nested switching, and Seata-based distributed transaction support. Compatible with Spring Boot 1.5.x to 4.x, integrated with Druid, HikariCp, BeeCp.

metadata.name: jetcache
metadata.description: JetCache is a Java cache framework.

summary.en: JetCache is an Alibaba open-source Java cache abstraction framework providing unified Cache API and declarative caching annotations more powerful than Spring Cache. It supports TTL, two-level caching, distributed auto-refresh and distributed locking, with implementations for Redis, Caffeine, and more. Features include cache statistics, custom serialization, and Spring Boot integration.

metadata.name: influxdb
metadata.description: Scalable datastore for metrics, events, and real-time analytics

summary.zh: InfluxDB 3 Coreæ˜¯InfluxDataæ¨å‡ºçš„ç¬¬ä¸‰ä»£æ—¶åºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºæŒ‡æ ‡ã€äº‹ä»¶å’Œå®æ—¶åˆ†æåœºæ™¯è®¾è®¡ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æ— ç£ç›˜æ¶æ„æ”¯æŒå¯¹è±¡å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œå…·å¤‡æ¯«ç§’çº§æŸ¥è¯¢æ€§èƒ½ï¼ˆlast-valueæŸ¥è¯¢<10msï¼‰ï¼Œå†…ç½®åµŒå…¥å¼Python VMç”¨äºæ’ä»¶å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒParquetæ–‡ä»¶æŒä¹…åŒ–ã€‚æä¾›SQLæŸ¥è¯¢å¼•æ“ï¼ˆFlightSQL/HTTPï¼‰ä¸InfluxQLåŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå…¼å®¹InfluxDB 1.x/2.xå†™å…¥APIï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¼ æ„Ÿå™¨ç›‘æ§ã€æœåŠ¡å™¨ç›‘æ§ã€åº”ç”¨æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§ã€é‡‘èåˆ†æåŠè¡Œä¸ºåˆ†æç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: InfluxDB 3 Core is InfluxData's third-generation time-series database designed for metrics, events, and real-time analytics. Featuring a diskless architecture with object storage support, it delivers sub-10ms query response for last-value queries. The embedded Python VM enables plugin development, while Parquet file persistence ensures efficient data handling. Dual query engines (SQL via FlightSQL/HTTP and InfluxQL) provide full backward compatibility with InfluxDB 1.x/2.x APIs, ideal for sensor monitoring, server/APM, network monitoring, financial analytics, and behavioral analysis.

metadata.name: vector
metadata.description: A high-performance observability data pipeline.

summary.en: Vector is a high-performance observability data pipeline built in Rust, maintained by Datadog. Deployable as both agent and aggregator, it unifies collection, transformation, and routing for logs, metrics, and traces. Up to 10x faster than alternatives, used in production by companies like Atlassian, T-Mobile, and Comcast for massive-scale observability data processing.

metadata.name: openjob
metadata.description: Distributed high performance task scheduling framework

summary.zh: Openjob æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜æ€§èƒ½åˆ†å¸ƒå¼ä»»åŠ¡è°ƒåº¦æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ Master/Worker æ¶æ„å’Œä¸€è‡´æ€§åˆ†ç‰‡ç®—æ³•å®ç°æ— é”è®¾è®¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ cron å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ã€ç§’çº§ä»»åŠ¡ã€å»¶è¿Ÿä»»åŠ¡ã€å·¥ä½œæµè°ƒåº¦åŠè½»é‡çº§åˆ†å¸ƒå¼è®¡ç®—ã€‚å…·å¤‡å¯è§†åŒ– DAG å·¥ä½œæµã€æƒé™ç®¡ç†ã€å‘Šè­¦ç›‘æ§å’Œä»»åŠ¡æ—¥å¿—å­˜å‚¨ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒ H2/MySQL/Elasticsearchï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Javaã€Goã€PHPã€Python ç­‰å¤šè¯­è¨€ï¼Œå…¼å®¹ MySQL/PostgreSQL/Oracle æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå¯æ— é™æ°´å¹³æ‰©å±•ã€‚
summary.en: Openjob is a high-performance distributed task scheduling framework using Master/Worker architecture with consistent sharding algorithm for lock-free design. It supports cron jobs, second-level tasks, delay tasks, workflow scheduling, and lightweight distributed computing. Features visual DAG workflow, permission management, alarm monitoring, and task log storage (H2/MySQL/Elasticsearch). Supports Java, Go, PHP, Python with MySQL/PostgreSQL/Oracle compatibility and unlimited horizontal scaling.

metadata.name: azkaban
metadata.description: Azkaban workflow manager.

summary.zh: Azkabanæ˜¯ç”±LinkedInå¼€æºçš„å·¥ä½œæµè°ƒåº¦ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤æ‚ä»»åŠ¡ä¾èµ–ç¼–æ’ã€å®šæ—¶è°ƒåº¦å’Œå¯è§†åŒ–ç›‘æ§ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨Javaå¼€å‘ï¼Œæä¾›Web UIç•Œé¢ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¤§æ•°æ®ETLä»»åŠ¡è°ƒåº¦ã€æ‰¹é‡ä½œä¸šç®¡ç†ç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Azkaban is an open-source workflow scheduling system developed by LinkedIn. It manages complex job dependencies, provides scheduled execution and visual monitoring through a web-based UI. Built with Java, it's ideal for data pipeline orchestration, ETL job scheduling, and batch processing workflows.

metadata.name: iot-benchmark

summary.zh: IoT-Benchmarkæ˜¯ä¸“é—¨ç”¨äºè¯„ä¼°æ—¶åºæ•°æ®åº“åœ¨å·¥ä¸šç‰©è”ç½‘åœºæ™¯ä¸‹æ€§èƒ½çš„å¼€æºåŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•å·¥å…·ã€‚æ”¯æŒIoTDBã€InfluxDBã€TimescaleDBã€TDengineç­‰12+ç§ä¸»æµTSDBï¼Œæä¾›æ•°æ®ç”Ÿæˆã€å†™å…¥ã€æŸ¥è¯¢ã€æ­£ç¡®æ€§éªŒè¯ç­‰ç»¼åˆæµ‹è¯•èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæ”¯æŒç»“æœå¯è§†åŒ–å’Œå¤šå½¢å¼æŠ¥å‘Šè¾“å‡ºã€‚
summary.en: IoT-Benchmark is an open-source benchmarking tool designed for evaluating time series database performance in Industrial IoT scenarios. It supports 12+ mainstream TSDBs including IoTDB, InfluxDB, TimescaleDB, and TDengine, providing comprehensive testing capabilities such as data generation, write/query testing, correctness verification, and result visualization.

summary.en: Tech Stack is a browser extension that automatically identifies and displays the tech stack of GitHub repositories when users visit them. By analyzing code structure and dependency configuration files, it helps developers quickly understand project technologies. Supports Chrome, Firefox, and Edge, free and open source forever.

metadata.name: airflow
metadata.description: Apache Airflow - A platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows

summary.zh: Apache Airflow æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨ Python ç¼–å†™çš„å¼€æºå·¥ä½œæµç¼–æ’å¹³å°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé€šè¿‡ä»£ç å®šä¹‰ DAGï¼ˆæœ‰å‘æ— ç¯å›¾ï¼‰å·¥ä½œæµï¼Œå®ç°ä»»åŠ¡çš„è°ƒåº¦ã€æ‰§è¡Œå’Œç›‘æ§ã€‚å¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºæ•°æ®ç®¡é“ã€ETL ä»»åŠ¡å’Œæ‰¹å¤„ç†æµç¨‹ç¼–æ’ï¼Œå…·å¤‡é«˜åº¦å¯æ‰©å±•æ€§å’Œä¸°å¯Œçš„é›†æˆç”Ÿæ€ã€‚
summary.en: Apache Airflow is an open-source workflow orchestration platform written in Python, enabling programmatic authoring, scheduling, and monitoring of workflows defined as DAGs. Widely used for data pipelines, ETL jobs, and batch processing with high extensibility and a rich ecosystem of integrations.

summary.en: A faster, better and more stable Redis desktop GUI client compatible with Linux, Windows, and Mac. Its core advantage is handling massive keys without crashing, offering smooth database management with key browsing, command execution, and log monitoring capabilities.

metadata.name: dolphinscheduler
metadata.description: Apache DolphinScheduler is the modern data orchestration platform. Agile to create high performance workflow with low-code

summary.zh: Apache DolphinScheduleræ˜¯Apacheé¡¶çº§å¼€æºçš„ç°ä»£åŒ–æ•°æ®ç¼–æ’å¹³å°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä½ä»£ç åˆ›å»ºé«˜æ€§èƒ½å·¥ä½œæµã€‚é‡‡ç”¨å»ä¸­å¿ƒåŒ–å¤šä¸»å¤šWorkeræ¶æ„ï¼Œæä¾›é«˜å¯ç”¨å’Œæ°´å¹³æ‰©å±•èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚æ”¯æŒWeb UIã€Python SDKå’ŒOpen APIç®¡ç†ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œæ—¥å¤„ç†èƒ½åŠ›è¾¾æ•°åƒä¸‡çº§ã€‚å†…ç½®ä¸°å¯Œä»»åŠ¡ç±»å‹ï¼Œè¦†ç›–ä¸»æµæ•°æ®æºï¼Œå…¼å®¹Standaloneã€Clusterã€Dockerã€Kuberneteså››ç§éƒ¨ç½²æ¨¡å¼ã€‚
summary.en: Apache DolphinScheduler is an Apache top-level open source modern data orchestration platform enabling low-code development of high-performance workflows. Built with decentralized multi-master and multi-worker architecture for high availability and horizontal scaling. Supports task management via Web UI, Python SDK and Open API, handling tens of millions of tasks daily. Features rich built-in task types covering major data sources with deployment modes including Standalone, Cluster, Docker and Kubernetes.

metadata.name: magic-api

summary.en: magic-api is a Java-based rapid API development framework that automatically generates HTTP interfaces through web-based script editing, eliminating the need for traditional Java classes. Supporting multiple databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Redis, it uses magic-script engine for dynamic compilation and real-time publishing, offering enterprise features like code completion, online debugging, and transaction support to dramatically improve API development efficiency.

metadata.name: hcaptcha-challenger

summary.en: An hCaptcha challenge solver using multimodal large language models without third-party services. Leverages ONNX models including ResNet, YOLOv8, ViT, and CLIP for image classification, point/bounding box detection, zero-shot multiple-choice, and drag-drop verification. Supports agentic workflows with spatial chain-of-thought reasoning.

It features a plugin-based architecture, supports multiple diagram structures including logic diagrams, org charts, and timelines. Nodes support rich text, images, and formulas. Exports to PNG/SVG/PDF formats, with cross-platform desktop client and plugins for Obsidian and UTools.

summary.en: The official Redis visual database management tool built with Electron and Monaco Editor. It supports key-value data browsing, CRUD operations for JSON/lists/hashes, real-time command profiling, performance optimization recommendations, SlowLog analysis, Pub/Sub interaction, and Workbench with intelligent auto-completion. summary.en: Keyviz is a free and open-source keystroke and mouse action visualizer that displays keyboard presses, mouse clicks, scrolls, and drags in real-time. It offers full customization of styling, colors, layout, filters, and animations. Designed for tutorials, presentations, and remote collaboration to help audiences clearly see shortcut operations. summary.en: TimescaleDB is a PostgreSQL extension for time-series data, engineered for high-throughput writes and real-time analytics. It uses hypertables for automatic partitioning and columnar storage for analytical query acceleration, fully compatible with the PostgreSQL ecosystem. Ideal for IoT monitoring, financial trading, and APM use cases.

summary.en: QuestDB is a high-performance open-source time-series database leveraging column-oriented storage, vectorized execution, and SIMD acceleration. It features a multi-tier storage engine from WAL to Parquet, delivering low-latency SQL queries and real-time ingestion. Specialized for financial tick data, sensor telemetry, and real-time monitoring, with Postgres protocol compatibility and Apache 2.0 licensing.

summary.en: ClickVisual is a lightweight log analytics and visualization platform built on ClickHouse, supporting SQL log queries, visual dashboards, alarm processing, and DAG workflows with VSCode-style configuration panel, GitHub/GitLab auth, and kubectl one-click deployment.

summary.en: Podman is a daemonless OCI container and Pod management tool built on libpod library. It supports OCI and Docker image formats, provides complete container lifecycle management, network isolation and resource management. Runs rootless on Linux and via VM on Mac/Windows, offering Docker-compatible CLI and REST API.

summary.en: ClickHouse is an open-source column-oriented DBMS designed for real-time OLAP analytics. It features vectorized execution engine and columnar storage architecture, delivering sub-second query performance on petabyte-scale data for analytics and logging workloads.

summary.en: An Nginx module providing active health checking for upstream servers. Supports multiple protocols including TCP, HTTP, SSL_HELLO, MySQL, AJP, and FastCGI with configurable check interval, fall/rise counts and timeout. Automatically marks failed servers as down, enabling automatic failover and improving system availability.

metadata.name: hmily
metadata.description: Distributed transaction solutions

summary.zh: Hmilyæ˜¯é‡‘èçº§åˆ†å¸ƒå¼äº‹åŠ¡è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨TCCï¼ˆTry-Confirm-Cancelï¼‰æ¨¡å¼å®ç°ã€‚æä¾›é›¶ä¾µå…¥å¼Spring-Boot/Spring-Namespaceé›†æˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒDubboã€SpringCloudã€Motanç­‰ä¸»æµRPCæ¡†æ¶ã€‚å…·å¤‡é«˜å¯é æ€§ï¼ˆå¼‚å¸¸è‡ªåŠ¨å›æ»šã€å®šæ—¶æ¢å¤é˜²æ‚¬æŒ‚ï¼‰ã€é«˜æ€§èƒ½ï¼ˆå»ä¸­å¿ƒåŒ–è®¾è®¡å¤©ç„¶æ”¯æŒé›†ç¾¤ï¼‰ã€å¯è§‚æµ‹æ€§ï¼ˆ metricsç›‘æ§+ç®¡ç†åå°UIï¼‰ã€‚å­˜å‚¨å±‚æ”¯æŒMySQLã€Oracleã€MongoDBã€Redisã€Zookeeperç­‰ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¾®æœåŠ¡æ¶æ„ä¸‹çš„è·¨æœåŠ¡äº‹åŠ¡ä¸€è‡´æ€§åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Hmily is a financial-grade distributed transaction solution implementing TCC (Try-Confirm-Cancel) pattern. It offers zero-intrusive Spring-Boot/Spring-Namespace integration with support for mainstream RPC frameworks including Dubbo, SpringCloud, and Motan. Features high reliability (automatic rollback, timed recovery), high performance (decentralized cluster-native design), and observability (metrics monitoring + admin UI). Storage backends include MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis, and Zookeeper, ideal for cross-service transaction consistency in microservices architectures.

metadata.name: juicefs
metadata.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

summary.en: JuiceFS is a high-performance distributed POSIX file system built on Redis and S3, designed for cloud-native environments. It stores data in object storage with flexible metadata engines including Redis, MySQL, and TiKV. Offering full POSIX compatibility, Hadoop ecosystem integration, Kubernetes CSI driver, strong consistency, and millisecond-level latency, it enables massive cloud storage to be used as efficiently as local storage without code modification for big data, ML, and AI workloads.

metadata.name: seaweedfs
metadata.description: SeaweedFS is a fast distributed storage system for blobs, objects, files, and data lake, for billions of files! Blob store has O(1) disk seek, cloud tiering. Filer supports Cloud Drive, xDC replication, Kubernetes, POSIX FUSE mount, S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, WebDAV, encryption, Erasure Coding. Enterprise version is at seaweedfs.com.

summary.zh: SeaweedFS æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜æ€§èƒ½åˆ†å¸ƒå¼å­˜å‚¨ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºæ•°åäº¿çº§æ–‡ä»¶çš„æµ·é‡æ•°æ®åœºæ™¯è®¾è®¡ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒå®ç° O(1) ç£ç›˜æŸ¥æ‰¾æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒäº‘åˆ†å±‚å’Œçº åˆ ç ã€‚æä¾› S3 APIã€S3 Gatewayã€Hadoopã€WebDAV ç­‰å¤šåè®®æ¥å…¥ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Kubernetes éƒ¨ç½²ã€FUSE æŒ‚è½½å’Œè·¨æ•°æ®ä¸­å¿ƒå¤åˆ¶ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºå¯¹è±¡å­˜å‚¨ã€æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿå’Œæ•°æ®æ¹–åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: SeaweedFS is a high-performance distributed storage system designed for massive-scale data with billions of files. It achieves O(1) disk seek efficiency with cloud tiering and erasure coding support. Offers multi-protocol access including S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, and WebDAV, with Kubernetes deployment, FUSE mounting, and cross-datacenter replication. Ideal for object storage, file systems, and data lakes.

summary.en: GitHunt is a React-based web application and Chrome extension that helps users discover the most starred GitHub projects on any date. It provides weekly trending rankings with list and grid view options, plus language filtering, ideal for developers to track open-source trends.

summary.en: Kuboard is a free Kubernetes management UI compatible with version 1.13+. It offers multi-cluster management, fine-grained permission control, microservices layer visualization, and graphical workload editing. Built-in monitoring suite via Prometheus/Grafana and logging via Loki support NFS/CephFS storage, serving 1000+ enterprises in production.

metadata.name: fastdfs
metadata.description: FastDFS is a high performance distributed file system (DFS). It's major functions include: file storing, file syncing and file accessing, and design for high capacity and load balance. Wechat/Weixin public account (Chinese Language): fastdfs

summary.zh: FastDFSæ˜¯é«˜æ€§èƒ½åˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ,ä¸“ä¸ºé«˜å®¹é‡å’Œè´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡åœºæ™¯è®¾è®¡ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨Trackerè°ƒåº¦å™¨ä¸Storageå­˜å‚¨èŠ‚ç‚¹åŒè§’è‰²æ¶æ„,æ”¯æŒæ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨ã€åŒæ­¥ä¸è®¿é—®,æ— éœ€ä¼ ç»Ÿå…ƒæ•°æ®æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚å…·å¤‡æ— å•ç‚¹æ•…éšœã€æ•°æ®å†—ä½™å¤‡ä»½ã€å°æ–‡ä»¶åˆå¹¶å­˜å‚¨ã€Nginxæ¨¡å—é›†æˆã€å¤šçº¿ç¨‹æ–­ç‚¹ç»­ä¼ ç­‰ç‰¹æ€§,å¹¿æ³›ç”¨äºå›¾ç‰‡è§†é¢‘åˆ†äº«å¹³å°åŠç½‘ç«™å†…å®¹å­˜å‚¨ã€‚
summary.en: FastDFS is a high-performance distributed file system designed for high capacity and load balancing. Featuring dual-role architecture with tracker and storage nodes, it enables file storage, syncing and access without traditional meta server. Key features include no single point of failure, data redundancy, merged small file storage, nginx module integration and multi-threaded resume upload/download, widely used in photo/video sharing platforms and web content storage.

summary.en: A Spring cache enhancement framework that solves cache stampede and consistency issues in high concurrency scenarios via delayed cache eviction. Non-invasive to business code, simply configure cacheManager in @CacheEvict to enable delayed cache clearing with debug logging support.

summary.en: Sagacity-SQLToy is an intelligent Java ORM framework that deeply integrates JPA functionality with powerful query capabilities. It features innovative cache translation to replace LIKE queries, cross-database SQL auto-adaptation, complex analytics including group summary, pivot/unpivot, YoY/MoM analysis, and tree aggregation. With sharding, multi-tenancy, data masking, and high-concurrency updateFetch, it excellently supports OLAP scenarios like ClickHouse and Doris.

metadata.name: cubefs

summary.en: CubeFS is a CNCF-graduated open-source cloud-native distributed file and object storage system supporting POSIX, HDFS, and S3 protocols. It provides strongly consistent metadata services with multi-tenancy isolation, hybrid-cloud multi-level caching, and flexible storage policies (replication/erasure coding), ideal for data lakes, private clouds, and storage-compute separation architectures.

metadata.name: ozone

summary.zh: Apache Ozoneæ˜¯ApacheåŸºé‡‘ä¼šæ——ä¸‹çš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼å¯¹è±¡å­˜å‚¨ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºHadoopå’Œäº‘åŸç”Ÿç¯å¢ƒè®¾è®¡ã€‚æ”¯æŒS3å’ŒHadoopæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»ŸAPIåŒåè®®ï¼Œå¯æ‰©å±•è‡³æ•°ç™¾äº¿å¯¹è±¡å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨RAFTåè®®å®ç°å¼ºä¸€è‡´æ€§ï¼Œæ”¯æŒKuberneteså’ŒYARNå®¹å™¨åŒ–éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œå…·å¤‡é«˜å¯ç”¨å¤šå‰¯æœ¬å®¹é”™èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œé›†æˆäº†Kerberosè®¤è¯ã€ACLsã€Rangerè®¿é—®æ§åˆ¶å’Œä¼ è¾“åŠ å¯†ç­‰ä¼ä¸šçº§å®‰å…¨æœºåˆ¶ã€‚
summary.en: Apache Ozone is a scalable, redundant, distributed object store developed under Apache Software Foundation, optimized for Hadoop and cloud-native environments. It supports both S3 and Hadoop File System APIs, scales to billions of objects and files, ensures strong consistency via RAFT consensus protocol, supports containerized deployment on Kubernetes and YARN, and provides enterprise security with Kerberos authentication, native ACLs, Ranger integration, and encryption.

summary.en: COLA is Alibaba's open-source Clean Object-Oriented and Layered Architecture framework, providing practical tools and best practices. It offers archetypes for rapid project creation and components including DTO, exception handling, state machine, domain entities, and extension points, following hexagonal/onion/clean architecture principles to decouple technical complexity from business logic.

metadata.name: ip2region
metadata.description: Ip2region is an offline IP address manager framework and locator with both IPv4 and IPv6 supported, supporting billions of data segments, ten microsecond searching performance, xdb search client for many programming languages

summary.zh: ip2regionæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾é«˜æ€§èƒ½ç¦»çº¿IPåœ°å€å®šä½åº“ï¼Œæ”¯æŒIPv4å’ŒIPv6ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨xdbæ ¼å¼å­˜å‚¨æ•°åäº¿çº§IPæ•°æ®æ®µã€‚é€šè¿‡vIndexç´¢å¼•ç¼“å­˜æˆ–å…¨æ–‡ä»¶å†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå®ç°å¾®ç§’çº§æŸ¥è¯¢å“åº”ï¼ˆ<10Î¼sï¼‰ï¼Œæä¾›åŸå¸‚çº§IPå½’å±åœ°æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚å†…ç½®æ•°æ®å»é‡å‹ç¼©æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ”¯æŒGolangã€Javaã€PHPã€Pythonç­‰å¤šè¯­è¨€å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚
summary.en: ip2region is a high-performance offline IP address geolocation library supporting both IPv4 and IPv6. Using xdb format to store billions of IP segments, it achieves microsecond-level query performance (<10Î¼s) through vIndex caching or full-file memory caching. Provides city-level IP location lookup with built-in data deduplication and compression, available in multiple language bindings including Golang, Java, PHP, and Python.

Built with Java/Eclipse RCP, it offers SQL editing, data visualization, ER diagrams, AI code completion, and GIS spatial data viewing. summary.en: Ceph is a unified distributed storage platform that provides object, block, and file storage through a decentralized architecture. It delivers high scalability, reliability, and performance for cloud computing, software-defined storage, and enterprise data center deployments, remaining one of the most active open-source storage projects worldwide.

summary.en: Apache Flink is an open source distributed stream processing framework supporting unified stream and batch computing. Core strengths include event-time semantics, exactly-once processing guarantees, high throughput and low latency. With Java fluent API, flexible windowing, custom triggers and back-pressure handling, it integrates with YARN, HDFS and other Hadoop ecosystem components, widely used for real-time analytics and event-driven applications.

summary.en: L2Cache is a distributed two-level caching framework combining Caffeine (L1) and Redis (L2) with hybrid mode support. It provides automatic hot-key detection, dynamic cache configuration, cache penetration/breakdown solutions, and batch operations. Production-validated with 35W QPS capability, ideal for core services like e-commerce, user management, and marketing platforms.

It features bidirectional linking, block-level references, and Markdown editing, with optional Docker deployment for complete local data storage. Available on desktop and mobile platforms for building personal knowledge bases.

summary.en: AgileBoot is a full-stack rapid development scaffold based on SpringBoot+Vue3. It features object-oriented business modeling, annotation-based permission control (menu/data permissions), multi-level caching (Redis+Guava), and comprehensive test coverage. Underwent extensive code specification refactoring compared to traditional projects like Ruoyi, providing production-level features like annotation-based master-slave DB switching, rate limiting, and duplicate request interception.

summary.en: Apache IoTDB is a time-series data management system designed for IoT scenarios, supporting integrated data collection, storage, and analysis. With lightweight architecture, it achieves high compression ratios and high-throughput read/write for millions of devices, seamlessly integrating with Hadoop and Spark ecosystem for industrial IoT data analytics.

summary.zh: crane4jæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨çš„æ•°æ®å¡«å……æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç®€å•æ³¨è§£é…ç½®å³å¯æ ¹æ®å¤–é”®æˆ–ç¼–ç å€¼è‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……å…³è”å­—æ®µã€‚æ”¯æŒæšä¸¾ã€é”®å€¼å¯¹ç¼“å­˜ã€æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨ç­‰å¤šç§æ•°æ®æºï¼Œæä¾›æ¨¡æ¿æ˜ å°„ã€åµŒå¥—å¯¹è±¡å¡«å……ã€æ’åºåˆ†ç»„ç­‰é«˜çº§åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ä¸Spring Bootæ·±åº¦é›†æˆï¼Œå¯è½»æ¾å®ç°ä¸€å¯¹ä¸€åˆ°å¤šå¯¹å¤šçš„å¤æ‚å­—æ®µæ˜ å°„ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆæ¶ˆé™¤æ•°æ®ç»„è£…ä¸­çš„é‡å¤æ ·æ¿ä»£ç ã€‚
summary.en: crane4j is an annotation-driven data filling framework that automatically populates associated fields based on foreign keys or encoded values through simple annotation configuration. It supports multiple data sources including enumerations, key-value caches, and method calls, providing advanced features like template mapping, nested object filling, and sorting/grouping. Deeply integrated with Spring Boot, it enables effortless one-to-one to many-to-many complex field mapping, effectively eliminating repetitive boilerplate code in data assembly.

summary.en: A ChatGPT-style Web UI powered by gpt4free (G4F) API, enabling free access to GPT-3.5/4 without requiring an API key. Features a user-friendly interface, Docker deployment support, and demo hosting on Replit and Hugging Face. The archived project remains as a reference for G4F web integration.

metadata.name: localGPT
metadata.description: Chat with your documents on your local device using GPT models. No data leaves your device and 100% private.

summary.zh: æœ¬åœ°æ–‡æ¡£æ™ºèƒ½å¹³å°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒç¦»çº¿è¿è¡Œçš„å¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹äº¤äº’ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æ··åˆæœç´¢èåˆè¯­ä¹‰ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦ã€å…³é”®è¯åŒ¹é…ä¸å»¶è¿Ÿåˆ†å—æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œé…åˆæ™ºèƒ½è·¯ç”±è‡ªåŠ¨é€‰æ‹©RAGæˆ–ç›´æ¥é—®ç­”æ¨¡å¼ã€‚çº¯Pythonæ¶æ„ä¾èµ–æå°‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒGPU/CPU/HPU/MPSå¤šå¹³å°ï¼Œæ–‡æ¡£å¤„ç†è¦†ç›–PDFã€DOCXç­‰æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå®ç°100%æ•°æ®éšç§ä¿æŠ¤ã€‚
summary.en: A fully private, on-premise document intelligence platform enabling chat with local GPT models. Features a hybrid search engine combining semantic similarity, keyword matching, and Late Chunking, with a smart router for automatic RAG vs direct LLM answering. Built with pure Python core, supports GPU/CPU/HPU/MPS platforms, handles PDF/DOCX formats, ensuring 100% data privacy.

metadata.name: spring-cloud-alibaba

summary.en: Spring Cloud Alibaba is an open-source one-stop solution for distributed application development by Alibaba, deeply integrated with the Spring Cloud ecosystem. Core components include Sentinel (flow control and circuit breaking) and Nacos (service discovery and configuration management), supporting distributed transactions, event-driven architecture, and dynamic configuration refresh for building microservices with Alibaba middleware.

It is a widely-adopted testing tool in the Java ecosystem for containerized test infrastructure.

Features GUI for batch downloading videos from creator pages, favorites, and watch-later lists. Uses FFmpeg for video transcoding (FLV merging and M4S to MP4), requiring logged-in Bilibili account.

summary.en: Enterprise-grade multi-tenant IoT cloud platform built on Spring Boot 4.0.3, Spring Cloud 2025.1.0, and Spring Cloud Alibaba 2025.1.0.0. Implements DDD architecture with Alibaba COLA framework, offering service discovery, config center, gray routing, circuit breaking, distributed transactions, caching, and locking. summary.en: CnosDB is a cloud-native open-source distributed time-series database built with Rust, designed for IoT, industrial internet, and connected vehicles. It features storage-computing separation, horizontal scaling, multi-tenancy with role-based access control, and supports SQL queries with schema-less writing for high performance and compression.

summary.en: Apache HoraeDB is a high-performance, distributed, cloud-native time-series database under Apache incubation. It offers efficient write, compression and aggregation for time-series data with Prometheus compatibility. Docker images available for IoT, monitoring and alerting scenarios.

summary.en: Hippo4j is a dynamic observable thread pool framework for high-concurrency scenarios, addressing pain points like difficult parameter evaluation, unaware task accumulation, and lack of monitoring. It provides runtime thread pool parameter modification, real-time monitoring, four alarm strategies, task context transfer, and graceful shutdown, supporting both configuration center and standalone deployment modes.

summary.en: Quarkus is Red Hat's cloud-native Java framework designed with a container-first philosophy. It achieves lightning-fast startup by moving computation to compile time, supporting both JVM and GraalVM native compilation for optimal Kubernetes deployment. The framework unifies reactive and imperative programming models while deeply integrating standards like RESTEasy, Hibernate, Vert.x, and MicroProfile, delivering an exceptional development experience for microservices.

summary.en: wrk is a modern HTTP benchmarking tool featuring a multithreaded architecture with scalable event notification systems (epoll/kqueue), capable of generating substantial load on single multi-core CPUs. It supports LuaJIT scripting for custom request generation, response processing, and reporting, making it ideal for web server performance evaluation.

Features Cargo, rustfmt, and Clippy tooling, widely used for WebAssembly, embedded development, and high-performance services.

summary.en: 7-Zip ZS is an enhanced version of 7-Zip with native support for six modern compression algorithms: Zstandard, Brotli, LZ4, LZ5, Lizard, and Fast-LZMA2. These algorithms offer a wide range from ultra-fast to high-compression options for various use cases. The project provides both full installer (with GUI and Explorer integration) and standalone codec plugin.

summary.en: This is an open-source backport project that enables Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA) from Windows 11 to run on Windows 10. By modifying WSAClient.exe and WSApatch.dll components, users can run Android applications on Windows 10. The project is archived but provides complete installation scripts and detailed setup guides.

summary.en: Automated build project integrating Magisk root and Google Play services into Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA). summary.en: Reloadium is a Python hot reloading and profiling tool enabling instant code updates on save. It provides frame-level reloading, multi-file dependency tracking, and database rollback, with ChatGPT integration for AI-assisted development, significantly improving Python development workflow.

summary.en: A bilingual web page translation browser extension enabling immersive dual-language reading. Supports input box translation, hover-to-translate for paragraphs, plus document translation for PDF, Epub, subtitles, and TXT files. Integrates multiple translation services with a clean, immersive interface. Note: This repository is for release distribution only; source code is not included as the software is closed-source.

It provides a web interface for script, environment variable and configuration file management, featuring second-level cron jobs, real-time log viewing, system notifications, dark mode, mobile access, with Docker and npm deployment options.

summary.en: gsudo is a sudo equivalent for Windows that enables running commands with elevated admin privileges. It auto-detects and integrates with multiple shells (Cmd, PowerShell, WSL, Git-Bash, MinGW, Cygwin). Features credentials cache to reduce UAC prompts across invocations, while supporting output piping and exit codes.

summary.en: Dragonfly is a high-performance in-memory data store fully compatible with Redis and Memcached APIs. Built with a multi-threaded architecture for vertical scaling, it delivers 25X throughput improvement over Redis with lower tail latency and 80% resource reduction. Zero code changes are required for adoption, making it ideal for high-concurrency caching and session storage scenarios.

summary.en: Tile38 is an open-source in-memory geolocation data store with spatial indexing and real-time geofencing capabilities. It provides spatial search methods including Nearby, Within, and Intersects, supports GeoJSON, Geohash and other geospatial formats, enables real-time geofencing alerts via webhooks or pub/sub, and is Redis protocol compatible, written in Go.

summary.en: Segment Anything Model (SAM) is a revolutionary image segmentation foundation model developed by Meta AI that generates high-quality object masks from arbitrary prompts like points, boxes, or text. Trained on 11M images and 1.1B masks, it demonstrates powerful zero-shot segmentation performance, supporting both automatic and interactive segmentation modes, setting a new benchmark in computer vision.

Extensible via plugins (.NET languages) and themes, it stores all game data locally for privacy. Built with C#/WPF for Windows desktop.

summary.en: Dozzle is a lightweight, web-based realtime log viewer for Docker containers, supporting Docker, Swarm and Kubernetes. It focuses purely on live log monitoring without storing files, offering intelligent fuzzy search, regex and SQL query capabilities. Features include split-screen viewing, realtime CPU/memory stats, multi-user authentication, agent mode for distributed monitoring, and dark mode, with a compact 7MB Docker image.
