summary.en: hsweb is an enterprise-grade admin framework built on Spring Boot 2.x featuring full reactive programming throughout. Offers DSL-style CRUD, JPA-like operations, RBAC and data permission management with modular architecture for flexible integration.

summary.en: Diboot is a low-code development framework for developers that eliminates 90% SQL writing through core components and code generators. It offers zero-code form/workflow design and full-stack code generation with a high-performance kernel, enabling flexible switching between pro-code, low-code, and no-code modes to boost development efficiency.

summary.en: KubeSphere is a distributed operating system for cloud-native application management built on Kubernetes, providing unified container management across multi-cloud, data centers, and edge environments. With a plug-and-play extensible architecture, it offers multi-tenant management, DevOps pipelines, application store, and cluster operations through an intuitive web UI.

summary.en: SpringBlade is a commercial-grade microservice architecture platform supporting both SpringCloud distributed and SpringBoot monolithic deployment. Built with Java17, Spring Boot 3.5, Spring Cloud 2025, it provides SaaS multi-tenant capabilities, multi-terminal authentication, and JWT security. Integrated with Nacos and Sentinel, featuring dual frontend frameworks (React/Vue). Stable in production for 6 years, now at V4.8.0.

It uses image recognition to locate UI elements without code injection. Features AirtestIDE GUI tool, supports large-scale device farm testing with HTML reports and screen recording, integrates with Poco for UI object hierarchy access.

With just a few lines of Python code, you can create interactive demos for models, APIs, or any functions, then generate public sharing links instantly. No frontend experience required, dramatically lowering the barrier to ML application deployment.

It features cross-platform support (CUDA/ROCm/DirectML/OpenVINO/MPS), advanced optimization (Triton/quantization/compilation), and image captioning via 150+ OpenCLiP models. Includes desktop/mobile UI with 10-language localization.

Features include bypassing high-load login restrictions, disabling data monitoring, connection maintenance, mixed API access, session import/export, chat history download, and GPT4-Mobile unlocking. It supports multiple audio formats via FFmpeg and is compatible with Windows 7-10, offering an intuitive interface for users seeking minimalist music management.

summary.en: An Auto.js-based game assistant script for "Punishing: Gray Raven" providing automation, OCR text recognition, image recognition, and coordinate management with multilingual UI, floaty window, and runtime logs, requiring Auto.js Pro or Autox.js environment.

Its architecture comprises Keeper for instance management, Sentinel for cluster view computation, and Proxy for client access, supporting Kubernetes, etcd, and consul backends with features including service discovery, dynamic reconfiguration, PITR, and standby clusters.

With horizontal scaling and fault tolerance, it excels in scheduled tasks, batch processing, and delayed job scenarios.

summary.en: MusicPlayer2 is a powerful Windows local music player built with C++/MFC. It features lyrics display with karaoke effects, online lyrics and album art downloading, spectrum analysis, equalizer, desktop lyrics, and taskbar lyric display. Supports dual playback engines (BASS/FFMpeg) with multiple interface themes, catering to music enthusiasts seeking highly customizable playback experience.

It enables users to access unavailable tracks and enjoy higher audio quality (up to 320K). Embedded into NetEase Music settings with AndroidX API, it supports the latest app versions.

It supports class loading inspection, decompilation, method call tracing, performance profiling, and system metrics monitoring via an interactive CLI.

metadata.name: ControlNet

summary.zh: ControlNetæ˜¯æ–‡æœ¬åˆ°å›¾åƒæ‰©æ•£æ¨¡å‹çš„æ¡ä»¶æ§åˆ¶æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å¤åˆ¶ç½‘ç»œå—ä¸ºã€Œé”å®šã€å’Œã€Œå¯è®­ç»ƒã€åŒå‰¯æœ¬å®ç°ç²¾ç»†æ§åˆ¶ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒåˆ›æ–°ã€Œé›¶å·ç§¯ã€æŠ€æœ¯ä½¿æƒé‡å’Œåç½®åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºé›¶ï¼Œè®­ç»ƒå‰ä¸äº§ç”Ÿä»»ä½•å¹²æ‰°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåœ¨å°æ•°æ®é›†ç”šè‡³ä¸ªäººè®¾å¤‡ä¸Šå¾®è°ƒã€‚è¯¥æ¶æ„å¯å¤ç”¨Stable Diffusionç¼–ç å™¨ä½œä¸ºå¼ºå¤§éª¨å¹²ç½‘ç»œï¼Œå®ç°è¾¹ç¼˜ã€å§¿æ€ã€æ·±åº¦ç­‰å¤šç§æ¡ä»¶çš„å›¾åƒç”Ÿæˆæ§åˆ¶ï¼Œä¸”æ˜¾å­˜éœ€æ±‚ä¸åŸSDç›¸å½“ã€‚
summary.en: ControlNet is a conditional control framework for text-to-image diffusion models, implementing fine-grained control by duplicating network blocks into 'locked' and 'trainable' copies. Its core innovation 'zero convolution' initializes weights and biases to zero, causing no interference before training and enabling fine-tuning on small datasets or personal devices. This architecture reuses Stable Diffusion encoder as a robust backbone for multi-condition control including edge, pose, and depth, with memory usage comparable to original SD.

summary.en: A comprehensive Java utility library built on Spring ecosystem. Core modules include: dynamic plugin jar loading, annotation-based download handler, WebSocket clustering (Redis/RabbitMQ/Kafka), async-to-sync conversion, event-driven model, MapQueue, and property inheritance. Designed to simplify complex logic into elegant APIs for enhanced productivity.

summary.en: winotify is a pure Python library for creating Windows 10 toast notifications without external dependencies, using only the built-in PowerShell. It supports stay-in-action-center notifications, clickable notifications with up to 5 action buttons, custom icons and audio, ideal for Windows desktop application notifications.

This enhanced fork of win10toast introduces callback_on_click functionality, enabling users to trigger custom functionsâ€”such as opening a URLâ€”when clicking notifications. Supports threaded mode for parallel execution.

metadata.name: mapstruct
metadata.description: An annotation processor for generating type-safe bean mappers

summary.zh: MapStructæ˜¯Javaæ³¨è§£å¤„ç†å™¨ï¼Œåœ¨ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆç±»å‹å®‰å…¨çš„beanæ˜ å°„ä»£ç ã€‚é€šè¿‡å£°æ˜æ˜ å°„æ¥å£é…åˆæ³¨è§£ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆå™¨è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ›å»ºå®ç°ç±»ï¼Œç›¸æ¯”è¿è¡Œæ—¶åå°„æ¡†æ¶å…·æœ‰æ˜¾è‘—çš„æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŠ¿å’Œç¼–è¯‘æ—¶ç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚æ”¯æŒJava 8+åŠJava 16+ recordsï¼Œæä¾›è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ˜ å°„é…ç½®ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºDTOè½¬æ¢ã€å¯¹è±¡æ‹·è´ç­‰ä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: MapStruct is a Java annotation processor that generates type-safe bean mappers at compile time. By declaring mapping interfaces with annotations, the generator automatically creates implementation classes, offering significant performance advantages and compile-time type checking compared to runtime reflection frameworks. Supports Java 8+ and Java 16+ records with customizable mapping configurations, ideal for DTO conversion and object copying in enterprise applications.

It enables one-line code authentication, supports mainstream frameworks like SpringBoot and Solon with Redis storage, dramatically simplifying permission development.

metadata.name: incubator-seata
metadata.description: :fire: Seata is an easy-to-use, high-performance, open source distributed transaction solution.

summary.zh: Apache Seata æ˜¯ Apache è½¯ä»¶åŸºé‡‘ä¼šçš„åˆ†å¸ƒå¼äº‹åŠ¡è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºå¾®æœåŠ¡æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ã€‚æ”¯æŒ ATã€TCCã€Sagaã€XA å››ç§äº‹åŠ¡æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæä¾›é«˜æ€§èƒ½å’Œæ˜“ç”¨çš„å…¨å±€äº‹åŠ¡åè°ƒæœºåˆ¶ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒç»„ä»¶åŒ…æ‹¬äº‹åŠ¡åè°ƒå™¨(TC)ã€äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨(TM)å’Œèµ„æºç®¡ç†å™¨(RM)ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸€é˜¶æ®µè§£ææ‰§è¡Œ+äºŒé˜¶æ®µæäº¤å›æ»šçš„å®ç°æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆè§£å†³è·¨æœåŠ¡æ•°æ®ä¸€è‡´æ€§é—®é¢˜ã€‚
summary.en: Apache Seata is a distributed transaction solution from Apache Software Foundation, designed for microservices architecture. It supports AT, TCC, Saga, and XA transaction modes with high performance and ease of use. Core components include Transaction Coordinator, Transaction Manager, and Resource Manager, implementing parse-execute in phase one and commit/rollback in phase two to solve cross-service data consistency issues.

summary.en: A practical sample demonstrating DDD (Domain-Driven Design) persistence with JPA, using a Tmall-like e-commerce business scenario. It showcases core DDD concepts including Entities, Value Objects, and Aggregate Roots implemented with JPA, covering e-commerce domains like orders, products, and users.

summary.en: A simple and elegant open-source markdown editor focused on speed and usability. Available for Linux, macOS and Windows, it offers real-time preview, syntax highlighting, and multiple editing modes. Built with Electron, it delivers a seamless writing experience for users seeking efficiency.

Uses EPDCA cycle and DDD methodology with technical debt assessment and automated testing protection plans.

summary.en: A dynamic query framework built on Spring Data JPA, inspired by Hibernate Criteria API. Provides builder-style chain APIs for constructing complex queries with conditions like Equal, NotEqual, Like, In, and NotIn. Supports left joins, pagination, sorting, and custom specifications, ideal for Java enterprise applications requiring flexible dynamic queries.

metadata.name: Live3D-v2

summary.en: Live3D v2 is a neural rendering system for anime character animation using attention mechanisms. It employs an enhanced U-Net architecture with self-attention modules, replacing the traditional ResNet50 encoder to enable conversion from 2D images or drawings to dynamic anime characters. Supports video generation, character colorization, and 3D point cloud reconstruction with Windows one-click deployment.

summary.en: Hutool is a comprehensive Java utility library that streamlines common development tasks by providing well-encapsulated tools for string manipulation, numeric processing, collection handling, encoding, date formatting, file operations, IO streaming, encryption, database JDBC, JSON, and HTTP client operations. It offers modular components including core utilities, caching, cron scheduling, cryptography, and database operations with thorough Chinese documentation.

Unlike Spring Data JPA's static annotation-based EntityGraph, it allows passing EntityGraph as a method parameter, letting developers choose which related entities to load dynamically per request, optimizing queries for different use cases.

summary.en: JetLinks is an enterprise-grade IoT platform built on Java 17, Spring Boot 3, WebFlux, Netty, and Vert.x. It features a fully reactive architecture supporting unified device access via TCP/UDP/MQTT/HTTP/CoAP protocols, with unified thing model management, real-time data processing, device alerting, and a flexible rule engine. Minimal deployment requires only Java 17, Redis, and TimescaleDB.

summary.en: KCNamer is a random Chinese name generator that creates names by combining surnames from a built-in database with ~1000 modern Chinese given names, or using completely random characters. It offers gender, length, and surname customization plus DIY name library support, available as standalone JAR or Java library.

It supports taskbar embedding, skin customization, historical traffic statistics, and hardware monitoring (temperature/GPU/disk). summary.en: A comprehensive backend admin system template built with Vue3, Pinia, Element Plus, and TypeScript, powered by Vite 3. Features include authentication, dashboard, data tables/forms, charts, rich text/Markdown editor, image upload, permission management, three-level menus, custom icons, and theme switching. summary.en: A pure Rust CLI tool for downloading files via bdex:// protocol. Supports multi-threaded parallel downloads, configurable retry attempts, and hash verification skipping. summary.en: Uperf is an Android userspace performance controller enabling dynamic performance tuning via sysfs nodes. It supports UI thread binding, touch boost, load sampling, and scene recognition, delivering kernel-level boost capabilities without modifying kernel or framework. Compatible with Android 6.0-12 and arm64-v8a, installable via Magisk or manually.

metadata.description: A simple proxy client

summary.zh: Netch æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº .NET 6.0 çš„ Windows ä»£ç†å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè¿›ç¨‹æµé‡æ‹¦æˆªã€å±€åŸŸç½‘å…±äº«ã€TUN è™šæ‹Ÿç½‘å¡ã€Web ä»£ç†ç­‰å¤šç§æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå…¼å®¹ Socks5ã€Shadowsocksã€ShadowsocksRã€WireGuardã€Trojanã€VMessã€VLESS ç­‰ä¸»æµåè®®ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ Netfilter/WinTUN å†…æ ¸é©±åŠ¨å®ç° UDP FullCone NATï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæ¸¸æˆåŠ é€Ÿå’Œç½‘ç»œä»£ç†åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Netch is a Windows proxy client built on .NET 6.0, supporting ProcessMode, ShareMode, TunMode, and WebMode with kernel-level drivers (Netfilter/WinTUN). It supports Socks5, Shadowsocks, ShadowsocksR, WireGuard, Trojan, VMess, and VLESS protocols, featuring UDP FullCone NAT for gaming acceleration and network proxy scenarios.

summary.en: A single-header C++ debugging macro library providing dbg(...) as a printf replacement. Features colorized terminal output, prints file/line/function names with type info, pretty-prints containers/smart pointers, works in expressions, and warns on inclusion. Compatible with C++11/14/17.

summary.en: A Spring Boot 2.7.18 and Jpa-based full-stack admin system with modular architecture. Features RBAC permission control via Spring Security and Redis, supporting data dictionaries, data permissions, dynamic routing, and one-click code generation. Includes enterprise features like logging, scheduled tasks, and DevOps deployment with Vue frontend.
